predicate.note: Frames file for 'rumor' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Revised by Olga.

roleset.name: tell or spread rumors

example.name: infinitival Arg1
example.text: Pennzoil-1 is rumored *trace*-1 to be accumulating a stake in Chevron in order to push for a revamping of the company...
example.arg: *trace*-1 to be accumulating a stake in Chevron in order to push for a revamping of the company

example.name: small clause
example.text: [Nashua Corp].-1, rumored *trace*-1 a potential takeover target for six months, said that a Dutch company has sought U.S. approval to buy up to 25% of Nashua's shares.

example.name: with Arg0
example.text: Mary rumored John to be an idiot.

example.name: just utterance
example.text: It has long been rumored that Ocean Drilling would sell the unit to concentrate on its core oil and gas business.
example.arg: Ocean Drilling would sell the unit to concentrate on its core oil and gas business

roleset.note: Ignore adjectival usages like "a rumored target".
